byline.contributor: J. David Goodman contributed reporting from New York.

snippet: There was a smaller number of protesters in the streets of Syria than in past demonstrations, but fighting was reported between security forces and army defectors.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: There was a smaller number of protesters in the streets of Syria than in past demonstrations, but fighting was reported between security forces and army defectors.

headline.main: Clashes Continue as Thousands Protest in Syria
headline.print_headline: Fatalities Reported in Latest Round of Syrian Protests
headline.seo: Thousands Protest and Clashes Continue in Syria
